title: Boundary Conditions Schema
description: Schema for validating boundary condition metadata in simulation pipelines.

x_min.description: Boundary condition on the minimum x face

x_max.description: Boundary condition on the maximum x face

y_min.description: Boundary condition on the minimum y face

y_max.description: Boundary condition on the maximum y face

z_min.description: Boundary condition on the minimum z face

z_max.description: Boundary condition on the maximum z face

faces.description: List of face IDs associated with boundary conditions

apply_faces.description: Faces to which the condition is applied

apply_to.description: Physical quantities affected by the condition

pressure.description: Pressure value for the boundary condition

velocity.description: Velocity vector for the boundary condition

no_slip.description: Whether the no-slip condition is applied
